job_tasks.phrase: Je werkt zowel zelfstandig als in teamverband aan unieke projecten, waarbij je jouw kennis van generatieve AI inzet om bedrijfsprocessen te verbeteren.
job_tasks.justification: This phrase describes working on projects and applying knowledge to improve business processes, which aligns with integrating AI into existing workflows.

job_tasks.phrase: In samenwerking met onze klanten ontwikkel en implementeer je oplossingen en strategieën die aansluiten op hun specifieke uitdagingen en doelstellingen.
job_tasks.justification: This directly refers to developing and implementing solutions, a core software engineering task, in collaboration with clients.

job_tasks.phrase: Met jouw ervaring draag je bij aan de vertaalslag van strategische doelen naar praktische, duurzame resultaten.
job_tasks.justification: This describes translating strategic goals into practical results, which is a common aspect of software development and project delivery.

job_tasks.phrase: Je geeft workshops waarin je bedrijven laat zien hoe generatieve AI hun bedrijfsdoelen kan ondersteunen.
job_tasks.justification: This involves understanding business goals and explaining how AI can support them, fitting the definition of Business Understanding & Strategy.

job_tasks.phrase: Ontwikkelen van AI-strategieën: Je analyseert klantbehoeften en ontwikkelt strategische roadmaps gericht op generatieve AI, waarbij verantwoord en ethisch gebruik centraal staat.
job_tasks.justification: While 'AI-strategieën' and 'roadmaps' lean towards business strategy, the analysis of needs and focus on generative AI application implies a data/solution-centric approach, aligning with the broader scope of preparing for AI implementation.

job_tasks.phrase: Projectmanagement en Implementatie: Je leidt de implementatie van AI-oplossingen en zorgt voor een naadloze integratie in bestaande systemen.
job_tasks.justification: This phrase explicitly mentions leading the implementation of AI solutions and ensuring seamless integration into existing systems, which is a key software development and integration task.

job_tasks.phrase: Hierbij begeleid je klanten stap voor stap bij het gebruik van deze technologie.
job_tasks.justification: Guiding clients step-by-step in using technology is part of the integration and adoption process, fitting under Software Development & Integration.

job_tasks.phrase: Langdurige Klantrelaties: Na implementatie blijf je betrokken om klanten te ondersteunen in het gebruik van generatieve AI en te informeren over nieuwe ontwikkelingen binnen het veld.
job_tasks.justification: Post-implementation support and informing clients about new developments relates to the ongoing maintenance and evolution of integrated systems.

job_tasks.phrase: Een pré is als je daarnaast technische vaardigheden hebt of wilt ontwikkelen om AI-toepassingen nog beter op klantvraagstukken toe te snijden.
job_tasks.justification: Developing technical skills to tailor AI applications to client issues implies working with the data and models that form the AI application, fitting under Data Engineering & Management.

profile.rationale: The job description heavily emphasizes software development and integration tasks (Macro-Category A), such as developing and implementing solutions, integrating them into existing systems, and providing ongoing support. While it mentions generative AI and strategy, the core focus is on applying this knowledge to improve business processes and deliver practical results through implementation. There are no explicit mentions of model development, fine-tuning, or specific GenAI frameworks, placing the role primarily in the software engineering domain that leverages AI.

confidence.reasoning: The job ad clearly outlines responsibilities related to implementation, integration, and client interaction, leaning heavily towards software engineering tasks. However, the specific mention of 'generative AI' and 'AI-strategieën' without detailing model-specific work or frameworks means the 'AI' aspect is present but not deeply technical in terms of model building. The role is described as an 'AI Consultant / Software Engineer', which aligns well with the 'AI-Adjacent Software Engineer' profile. The confidence is high, but not a perfect 5, due to the slight ambiguity in the depth of AI technical involvement.
